name: Sankaku Complex Clean Soft Dark
description:
Edit the domain manually (url in the first line in code) to make the css work.
  • • Simple clean flat compact gray dark theme with soft low contrast not distracting colors.
  • • Many irrelevant/distracting elements removed.
  • • Many other elements moved closer to make a better use of screen space.
  • • Logo removed.
  • • Ads removed.
A bit of code based on Sankaku Complex Dark style by noisy322.
